dict.string: export MYSQL_PWD=A.sugus;mysql --raw --skip-column-names -uroot -h localhost -b pacsdb -e "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM study LEFT JOIN study_query_attrs ON study.pk=study_query_attrs.study_fk LEFT JOIN issuer ioan ON study.accno_issuer_fk=ioan.pk LEFT JOIN person_name rp ON study.ref_phys_name_fk=rp.pk LEFT JOIN patient ON study.patient_fk=patient.pk LEFT JOIN patient_id ON patient.patient_id_fk=patient_id.pk LEFT JOIN issuer iopid ON patient.patient_id_fk=iopid.pk LEFT JOIN person_name p ON patient.pat_name_fk=p.pk

export MYSQL_PWD=A.sugus;mysql --raw --skip-column-names -uroot -h localhost -b pacsdb -e "SELECT study.accession_no,ioan.entity_uid, study.study_iuid, study.study_custom3,patient_id.pat_id,iopid.entity_uid,p.family_name,p.given_name,p.middle_name,p.name_prefix,p.name_suffix,study.study_date,study_query_attrs.mods_in_study,study.study_desc,rp.family_name,rp.given_name,rp.middle_name,rp.name_prefix,rp.name_suffix,study.study_custom2,iopid.entity_uid,patient.pat_birthdate,patient.pat_sex,study.accession_no,ioan.entity_uid,study.study_id,study.study_iuid,study.study_time,study.study_custom1 FROM study LEFT JOIN study_query_attrs ON study.pk=study_query_attrs.study_fk LEFT JOIN issuer ioan ON study.accno_issuer_fk=ioan.pk LEFT JOIN person_name rp ON study.ref_phys_name_fk=rp.pk LEFT JOIN patient ON study.patient_fk=patient.pk LEFT JOIN patient_id ON patient.patient_id_fk=patient_id.pk LEFT JOIN issuer iopid ON patient.patient_id_fk=iopid.pk LEFT JOIN person_name p ON patient.pat_name_fk=p.pk
